title: Who Is America's God Now? | Guests: Dave Rubin & Artur Pawlowski | 4/12/22
description:
BlazeTV host Dave Rubin of “The Rubin Report” joins to discuss his new book, “Don’t Burn This Country: Surviving and Thriving in Our Woke Dystopia." Canadian pastor Artur Pawlowski joins Glenn to share the story of his multiple arrests for violating COVID-19 policies and the abuse he endured while in jail. Glenn kicks off a four-part series, seeking to answer the question, “Who is America's god now?” Glenn discusses how fast society has shifted into a filtered reality where everything is okay. Glenn shares a personal story of a loss he’s experienced to encourage people to live the life they’re called to live. Glenn and Stu discuss President Biden’s latest move against "ghost guns" and the regulation of cheese.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
